summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4037 for the improvement of California Avenue, from West Othello Street to West Portland Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 48830, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
